description: Chief constable says people "are finding it difficult to be together" during the emergency measures.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man sees 71% rise in domestic disputes under lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man sees 71% rise in domestic disputes under lockdown - BBC News
maintext: Mr Roberts said that while the "vast majority" of people on the island "were doing the right thing" by practising social distancing, some were flouting the emergency laws.
